name: Meatshields
description:
Meatshields is a multiplayer, in-browser, turn-based strategy game designed to be played at your convenience. Log on and take your turns whenever you are bored at work, or riding the bus, or waiting for a pizza to get delivered.

Balance the combined strengths and weaknesses of your units to take down your opponent's forces and claim victory.

It has a full tutorial, ability to practice with bots, guest mode, and lobby system, among many other features.

Play right now at https://meatshields.com -- no email or validation required :)
